newsitem.title: USA: Schroder Asian net asset value up vs yr ago.
newsitem.headline: Schroder Asian net asset value up vs yr ago.

text.p: The Schroder Asian Growth Fund Inc, a closed-end management investment company, said on Tuesday its total net assets at July 31, 1996 were $265 million and the net asset value per share was $13.51.
The result for the quarter ended July 31 is down 7.02 percent from the previous quarter, but up 1.50 percent from a year ago.

This compares with total net assets of $284.9 million and net asset value per share of $14.53 at the end of second quarter 1996, and total net assets of $261.07 million and net asset value per share of $13.31 at the end of third quarter 1996.
The above figures are based on 19.6 million shares outstanding.
For the quarter ended July 31, 1996, the Fund had a net realized and unrealized loss of $20.3 million or $1.04 per share. The net investment gain for the period was $336,255 or $0.02 per share.
